openTicket.title: Open a ticket
openTicket.description:
__**ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ Dear customers,**__

We thank you for your interest in our products. To ensure a smooth and efficient shopping experience on our server, we have set up a specific procedure.

Before purchasing v-bucks, we invite you to visit the <#1200995484869853264>, where you'll find detailed information on the purchasing procedure. For information specific to Modern WarfareÂ® 3/ Warzone, please refer to the shows dedicated to this game.

Once you have familiarized yourself with this information, you will need to **create a ticket** for the product purchase. This ticket will allow us to track your request and provide you with personalized assistance throughout the purchasing process.

We thank you for your understanding and look forward to serving you.
### __And ONLY make a ticket when you are 100% ready to buy or else you will be banned.__

__**Best regards, the Nexus Shop team.**__
